website_summaries.verdict: This forgiving cover defends both your watch's screen and body and is almost invisible when installed.
pros: Soft, cushiony case with built-in screen protector
Two-pack of 40-millimeter Apple Watch 4 covers made from quality TPU
Screen still responds to touch when applied
cons: Bumper scuffs relatively easily, but these may wipe clean
Dirt and sweat can get under screen protector

customer_reviews.title: Buy it !!
customer_reviews.text: When looking for a case I was very unsure but I purchased this anyway. Thank god i did. This case is plastic so when water gets stuck in between the watch and the case I can easily remove it and clean it. The case is very resistant and I can wear my watch freely without worrying about damages/scratches or dropping it. The screen is as responsive as without the case.
customer_reviews.author: Lizeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put on it’s not in the way of the screen and it comes with two that’s everything I need and hopefully I don’t have to enter change the plastic too much
customer_reviews.author: A Grey

customer_reviews.title: WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Well to start I don’t really write reviews unless I love the the product, the clear case I got is just awesome. And it just exceeded my expectations. LOVE IT and WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I got my new watch and promptly dropped it on the tile floor, face down, and smashed the screen. It is thin enough that you dont ever notice its there, very easy to put on and take off. Does not bother the touch screen application. I HIGHLY recommend this item. Save yourself the hassel of having to send your watch in to have the screen replaced! Well worth it, and you get 2. Perfect companion to your watch.
customer_reviews.author: Dani and Robert Guile

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’m terribly clumsy and my last Apple Watch finally gave up on my after two years of knocking it into walls, getting water on it, etc. I purchased these covers immediately when I got my new watch and have not been disappointed. No damages so far and the cover has had no impact on the screen’s functions at all! I’m also happy you can barely tell the watch is covered at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kandee

customer_reviews.title: *BETTER AND IMPROVED UPDATE*Good protection but sensitivity so much
customer_reviews.text: *** UPDATE *** 10-23-19 I re-ordered this when the original started to turn a little yellow after about a year of wearing it. I don’t know what they did to improve this but they did a phenomenal job!! This new version is VERY responsive to touch! I would definitely recommend this now!!! Great for protection but watch does not recognize your initial tap(s) and it take a couple of trials for it to do so. I think I will keep it on for protection but will be looking elsewhere for something more sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: MomentsToEnjoy

customer_reviews.title: A must-buy for the Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect because I don’t have to buy a glass protector, but it also is secured by the watch band. I kept buying those hard plastic covers that snap on, but they fall off. So I tried the one that goes around the boarder of the watch, but it takes away from the watch being thin, and you still need a protector for the screen with those. This protector covers the screen and maintains the thinness of the watch. It’s absolutely what I’ve been wait for for years now. Will buy again when the TPU plastic starts to yellow. Great case!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind

customer_reviews.title: Barely visible once it's installed
customer_reviews.text: I want to protect my new watch, but I didn't want something overly large. This case fits the bill. And the watch. It's flexible enough for ease in installation. It's thin enough that it's barely visible once it's in place. Thick enough to protect with holes precisely where they need to be. For a great price, you get not one, but two. Can't ask for anything more in a protective case. Received quickly. Very happy and would recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: HappyReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and covers everything!
customer_reviews.text: It is not a hard plastic case, instead it is more of a silicon. Pros: Fitting the case over my Apple Watch was a snap! The case covers the whole face and sides. The touch screen still works beautifully and the jewel is not hindered in anyway. Still have good flexibility and doesn't take up any extra space on the wrist. Cons: None as of yet... Fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this case.. it looks great and was a great price. Had a little difficulty getting the case on my watch but that’s only because it’s made to fit nice and snug which is a plus. It fits perfectly. My problem with the case is that it messes with the touch sensitivity of my watch so much so that it’s pointless to have it on. The frustration from having to tap on apps, etc.. 5+ times to get them to open just isn’t worth keeping the case on it I would return this however the shipping costs are more than what I paid for the case.
customer_reviews.author: Ash412

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Protection
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen protector. I searched for another cheaper one like it, but no luck. The only ones I found were the snap on ones that fall off so easily, when you brush it against something. Even though it’s $8.99 for one, I ordered two more. It looks nice, not too bulky and touch sensitive. There are times when I have to touch it several times, but everything else about it outweighs that problem. I’d rather go through that than chance scratching or cracking my expensive Apple watch. So happy I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Here in Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a Julk cover on my series 3 watch so I ordered another one for my series 4 watch. It’s easy to install and fits perfectly. You will need to take it off if you plan to get the watch wet, but that isn’t a problem for me. I noticed that the first cover I had for the series 4 was causing watch to not respond when I pressed on certain areas of screen, especially right in the middle. I went ahead and ordered another one and this one is much better. Overall a great cover to keep your watch from getting scratched up!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Incredible product
customer_reviews.text: The screen/watch protector does what it needs to and what makes it stand out is that you have COMPLETE coverage of the watch face, the front bezel all the way around the sides to the back, and it works perfect. I was extremely hesitant when purchasing a protective cover for my watch because I've ran into the problem of the screen not reacting to my touch. However, this product does not have that problem. I would recommend this to any and everyone. 5-stars, AMAZING customer support and communication. A+
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!! Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this for my new series 4. I love how it covers the whole entire watch so no need to worry if you accidentally hit a corner of a desk or counter if it’s going to chip your watch. It’s thick enough to protect but thin enough that the screen is still responsive!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly! works great! It's thin which is great because I don't want my watch looking bulky, but it still protects the screen & sides just like a thicker case would! Must buy. Apple Watch scratches super easy! If you don’t have this you will have a torn up screen in no time. I have recommended this to all my friends and family for their watches because of how great it is! Very simple to put on/take off. Snug fit to the watch & very easy to clean if its dirty!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Quarne

customer_reviews.title: Protects the watch, but is itself vulnerable
customer_reviews.text: This protected my watch from scratches for the first few weeks I owned it, but it affected the touch screen so bad that I couldn't type in my passcode. I could only unlock my watch with my phone. There were a few times I tried to use my watch to ping my phone after I misplaced it, but I couldn't type the passcode to unlock the watch so I couldn't ping the phone. Eventually became so scratched and/or foggy that I had to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: MotherOfDachshunds

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for mine and my daughters apple 5 series watches. After a couple weeks past the face of the watch became discolored liked it was damaged. I took the protectors off and cleaned the screens. The screens still seemed to be discolored/damaged. I was really upset. I gave it some time and it seem to clear up some more as the days went on. They were not exposed to moisture during the time the time the protectors were on so I'm not sure what happened but it happened to all watches involved.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Julk case for 4 series Apple Watch ( LOVE IT)
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 2 pack julk cases for my 4 series Apple Watch. I received the metallic rose gold and clear case. I love them both but I’ll be using my metallic rose gold one for a while lol. Great purchase, came a little earlier than expected during the day which was even better. It’s very sturdy and easy to install, great merchandise for a great price. I’ll be purchasing more in the future, big thank you to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: janay

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: This arrived yesterday. I was getting concerned I would do serious damage to my watch face, as I have started doing a lot of work outside lately. I read reviews and watched a video, helping me decide to try this item. I like the fact that it not only protects the screen, but wraps around the watch to protect much of the case. The plastic is solid, but is flexible enough to make installation pretty easy. The touchscreen is just a tad less responsive toward the middle, I just have to press a little harder. So far, this is the only downside, but I understand how this can happen.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C. Dibble

customer_reviews.title: The thouch screen goes awry completely!
customer_reviews.text: Basically your touch doesn't work (at all). That's about it. Stay away from this piece of crap. Update: the costumer service contacted me and reimbursed me for the defective product. I give them a thumbs up for the costumer service, but my opinion about the product hasn't changed.
customer_reviews.author: Rashidnew

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased my Apple Watch several people told me I needed a cover. I would not recommend this product. The touch screen was difficult to use and I found dirt and hair would get caught easily under the cover. Because it is difficult to take off, it became annoying having to clean it so often. I ended up taking mine off and don’t plan on using this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine J. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome when you first get it on, that is until you wash your hands or come in contact with water. It gets tapped between the case and the screen so touch screen becomes unresponsive. At first it’s snug ish which makes it hard to remove the water but then it gets loose and lets more water in. Super frustrating. If you don’t mind removing your watch before washing your hands you’ll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: HisArrowMaker

customer_reviews.title: annoying
customer_reviews.text: helps prevent scratches- which i had a lot of prior to getting a case. The annoying thing about having this case completely cover the watch is that you can’t get it wet.. like at all.. otherwise you have to undo the watch strap and take the case completely off and dry it. there have been times when i wash my hands and get water on the watch and then the touch screen doesn’t work, even sweating at hot yoga.. so that is pretty annoying. I would rather have a case that clips to the top of my watch.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Julk  Case for Apple Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a Apple Watch 4 I ordered the case for it mainly because my brother swears by them. This is a great brand and case very durable great quality. I ordered a pack of 2. It’s a must buy for any Apple Watch owners.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl A. Ned

customer_reviews.title: Saved my watch from a baseball bat!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover has held up wonderfully!! And as I was on the baseball field, my child took a practice swing not knowing I was behind him and hit my wrist/hand. One side of the barrel of the bat hit my hand, gashing it and causing a hematoma. The other side hit my watch. I just knew my hand was broke and my watch was too. But nope! I credit this cover with saving both my hand and my watch. (Photo of damage attached, it cut through cover, not a scratch on the watch) Pros: Easy to install Fits tight Touch screen works well Price Tough!! Con: Starts to turn yellow after a few months
customer_reviews.author: ajordan414

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this case for 2 days & I fell in love with it immediately. First off, it was easy to install. Touch screen is easy to operate. Scratch resistant & protects well especially because of the job I do. I highly recommend this case for Apple Watch June 24, 2020 update: Although the watch case is very protective when I work out my sweat gets in between the watch & the case causing me to no be able to operate my watch due to the liquid. I have to remove the case during my workouts & put it back on afterwards. Very annoying. I did explain this to the seller who was nice & understanding.
customer_reviews.author: Br00klyn85

customer_reviews.title: Great product with water sport limitations...
customer_reviews.text: The product is overall a good fit for the Apple Watch Series 4...it provides excellent protection for the watch. There is no problem working the controls. However, moisture is almost always visible between the watch and the protector. The protector tends to turn yellow over time. Additionally I don’t recommend it for swimming. The water gets between the watch and the product and makes it impossible to work the controls... So buy if you don’t intend to swim with it, it does provide excellent protection. You will replace it after a time due to a slight yellowing...assuming it bothers you.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Works better than film protection
customer_reviews.text: I had problems with 2 different screen protector films for my Apple watch. I am glad I switched to this case. It works well and is cheaper than the screens I previously purchased. I don’t have any issues using the touch screen through the cover. I like that the entire watch is covered with openings in the correct places for dial, etc. I do think I will have to remove it when I swim, as the minor drawback is that moisture can get trapped under the cover if the watch gets wet. However, the cover is easily removed. I remove it about once every two weeks to clean the cover. It’s been a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic screen case for series 5 Apple watch
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was looking for a case to protect her watch during work. This does just that. I found it surprising that she mentioned how much she liked it after the first three days of wearing the case on her watch to work.She usually never says much about things like that. She told me that it fits perfectly on her series 5, that the sensitivity to the touch screen does not get hindered at all & it fits so snug you can’t tell that it’s on the watch at all. So all-in-all it was a great purchase & perfectly priced. I know where to come when I get an Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Erica A.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Can’t use watch w it in, Dora not respond well to touch.
customer_reviews.text: Sadly it was very difficult to use watch’s features a it on. Sometimes it worked and most times it didn’t. This was my second attempt at protecting my watch. If you don’t use it much it may work, but I got frustrated. Even when I had all the time in the world to touch it in the most “appropriate” way. I didn’t mind that I had to take the straps off to install it as I thought it would give it even better protection but I don’t know how people can enjoy the watch’s features with it on. I wanted nothing more than for it to work!
customer_reviews.author: Marta M. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: It does great at what it’s supposed to do but.....
customer_reviews.text: This product is fine. It does what it’s supposed to do. Easy to put on and easy to still use touch screen and use the buttons. I work in a hospital and work out often so sometimes when I sweat the moisture would get up under the screen and get in between the watch face and the inside of the screen protector. In that case you have to take it off and wipe down the screen and put it back on. Kind of annoying but I figured this product was worth a try. It’s starting to get discoloration but I think that’s just from a years worth of use. Plus it’s clear so it’s bound to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this screen protector. Never had any issues with it until I sprayed OFF bug spray on it accidentally before going on a picnic and it changed the color of the protector permanently to a milky white. I was embarrassed to walk around like that all day. When I returned home, I sprayed the screen with my other daily skincare products and it made it worse. Not sure what chemicals mixed together but avoid getting any type of perfume, sprays, or lotions on this protector. Never had this issue with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, protects, but not clear
customer_reviews.text: Product went on easily, and seems to protect the watch well. It's nice that it's all-in-one (vs. a frame protector and separate screen protector. However, brand new out of the box, it's not clear. Tiny lines are evident. They don't significantly impact the view of the screen, but it's not nearly as clear as an adhering screen protector (which I used previously, but it wouldn't stay on the rounded edges). Update: don’t sweat with it on or get it wet. You’ll have to remove it and clean it to be able to see your watch.
customer_reviews.author: BeOutside

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to instal without leaving any fingerprints. The rose gold is more or a metallic flashy color and does not really match the color of a rose gold Apple Watch. It certainly stands out, much more than for my liking. I wish it was more of a matte color. In terms of the sensitivity, I found myself needing to apply more pressure when touching the screen or having to repeat my step twice. What I did not like was that it’s very difficult to keep it looking clean. I constantly have to wipe the screen area clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in dry climates
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I've noticed that I didn't like about this product is that water was being retained between the watch and the case. Luckily I knew it was raining before going outside so I turned on the water resistant feature before leaving the building. I really like the responsiveness of the screen through this case and how protective it feels for my watch. At work I'm constantly bumping my watch on objects while I load and unload them and this makes me feel much more comfortable wearing a watch to work.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna Glaza

customer_reviews.title: Touch doesn’t work fast with protector.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and confidence that comes with this protector but I can’t use it. It’s not like a tap and go it’s more like a quadruple touch and go. It takes forever to close an app on my watch because it doesn’t detect I’m trying to close from the protector. I need something scratch proof but I also want to be able to use it without getting frustrating when I’m trying to type something thing in a message and it takes like 8clicks for 1 letter. I don’t recommend this screen protector at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Touch feature works through cover!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my case. It fits perfectly and is easy to slip on. I was skeptical that the touch feature on the watch would work, but it works fabulously!! Way to go. As a golfer, I am often banging around with clubs, and the cover is thick enough to protect it. Since I just bought it I don’t know about durability, but it seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: K MCK

customer_reviews.title: Great protection without the bulk
customer_reviews.text: I’m a pretty active person who regularly uses their watch for gym and hiking purposes (as well as for notifications and so forth). I’ve always had the tendency to bump my watch against tables or gym equipment, leading to scratches on the screen. This is WAY better than a tempered glass cover. This casing is more “malleable” and can take a hit without damage. The case doesn’t “yellow out” or obstruct any of the watches features. Touch screen is still very accessible and easy to see. This does a great job of protecting the watch without adding bulk or taking away from the look of the device.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great product- iWatch must have!
customer_reviews.text: I‘m really impressed with this item. It doesn’t alter the appearance of your iWatch- it’s hardly noticeable. And, I feel it has truly protected my new iWatch from scratches and dents. The only thing I have noticed is water can get trapped between the case and your screen so just keep an eye on it. I also have tempered glass screen protector on my iWatch and touchscreen works well (When I ordered, I wasn’t sure if the double protective layers would affect the touch screen). I think it’s a great product and the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs BTB

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the case for the Series 3 Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed and re-ordered multiples of the Julk Case for my Apple Watch Series 3. So when my sister got her Series 4, I immediately ordered one for her. She is having issues with it. The touchscreen doesn't work well at all, and it fits so tightly that she's afraid it will rip when she puts it on. Plus, for some reason, she has to constantly enter her pin. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It works just fine.
customer_reviews.text: So glad it comes with two cases. I have had it for about two months and the part that covers the watch screen has a few marks that would have been terrible had they happened to the watch face itself. Instead, they are minor issues and don't distract from the watch. I treat my things with care - but accidents and minor smashes do happen. Very easy to install does not detract from the beauty of the watch. Interestingly, it was an employee in an Apple Store that recommended this particular cover to me as one that she uses on her Apple Watch. So glad she did.
customer_reviews.author: Elna

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough, not perfect touch screen compatibility
customer_reviews.text: First, this was a little challenging to put on. Touch transfer is pretty good but not perfect; it seems to have dulled the touch responsiveness just a bit. The cover holds onto to oils and smudges easily, and it gets kind of gross underneath after workouts because it's not adhered to the watch, so sweat etc. becomes trapped under the material. That said, I do trust it to protect the watch, and it's pretty unobtrusive. I prefer it over a glass screen protector because the curved glass protectors never seem to fit correctly. I intend to keep using this case.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great protective cover
customer_reviews.text: This was great, easy to put on, can’t even notice it is on the face. I have not used the rose one yet, but overall I am happy. I am very rough on items like this and have bumped into a lot of things already and this has been very protective. Very easy to put on. The only item I would say may be a negative, is the cover has openings for pressing the button to remove band, but I have to go under the cover, I can’t get it to release through the cover, but honestly that is not a issue or negative to me. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Amazing BUT scuffs easily
customer_reviews.text: I got a scuff in the corner of the clear case within the first hour of putting it on. I'm not even sure how I managed to lol. It is barely noticeable though and better than it being the actual watch. The case is great and from the research I've done, it is one of the better options. I am considering getting another order of both clear ones considering they're only $4 each. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Makes watch screen very unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is think enough that it does not register your touch on the watch face. Hard to close apps, hard to answer calls, hard to open apps, hard to open texts, hard to activate the screen at all. It is also complicated to take on and off since it wraps around even the crown. Washing our hands means taking the cover off to dry the watch and the protector. It does protect the screen well, just makes the functionality of the watch minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Monica L.

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: When I first got my Apple watch a year ago I bought a screen protector from my cellphone provider. The “protector” offered no protection and tore if it came into contact with just about anything. This protector is durable and the price is great. It does loose some clarity after a few months so it needs to be changed a couple of times a year but at this price for 2 protectors it’s worth it. This is my 2nd order and I can’t recommend it highly enough. Seller is very responsive and cares if you aren’t happy. No problem giving it 5 and the vendor 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: bobcat46

customer_reviews.title: Dirt, dust, smudges and condensation collect under cover
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to purchase this cover because of the coverage it offered. But I am very disappointed with my cover. I take it off when doing dishes or washing my face and very careful when washing my hands when wearing my watch. Some how the cover constantly get smudges, dirt and condensation under the cover. I’ve purchased this cover around January and needed to take the cover off on a weekly basis to clean it. I also lose the touch capability at times when using this cover. Taking the cover off and on to clean weekly is very time consuming. I am at the point of just getting rid of the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jurski

customer_reviews.title: Best protection for your money
customer_reviews.text: I’m really happy I chose these Apple Watch cases from Julk! It is easy to install, have not had any problems with touch screen except if moisture gets in there (I washed my hands and a little water got in there) but you just remove and dry! I’m looking for other colors now. I also asked a cell phone tech if there was a better product and when I showed him mine he said wow, that one is better than the one I have...and he was even more impressed when I told him what I paid!
customer_reviews.author: Indira Florian

customer_reviews.title: May work for some people.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this “Apple Watch condom” as I call it. When I got my new watch I wanted to protect it and so I purchased this. Two come in the shipment which is cool if one wears out. BUT it completely alters your ability to use the watch. Forget being able to use the touchscreen, you have to constantly retouch what your trying to do. What can I say. I’m a millennial and didn’t have the patience. So when a friend noticed it said he liked it, I took it off my watch and gave it to him.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Reneé

customer_reviews.title: Almost Invisible :)
customer_reviews.text: I am more than happy! I am thrilled with this choice. I was afraid it would be bulky but it IS almost invisible. I don’t think most people when even notice it’s there! Pros Thin Good coverage Easy to put on Comes with cleaner Touch screen works Scrolling works Can remove watch band while protector is on Protects my entire watch Heart rate still works Watch back still in contact w/ my skin Almost INVISIBLE :) Good price Cons None so far ;)
customer_reviews.author: The Shopping Wiser Family

customer_reviews.title: Moisture gets trapped
customer_reviews.text: This is a great screen protector...easy to put on, still have functionality with the touch screen, seems to be super protective. BUT, moisture gets trapped in there during everyday tasks like washing hands and I didn't trust that the moisture sitting trapped inside the case wasn't going to damage my watch. So took it off and can't wear it. Cannot take it off to clear out the moisture every day because that's a lengthy and annoying process. Wish it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Laura W.

customer_reviews.title: Great built in screen protector case for Apple Watch 4
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Can be a little sensitive for the Apple Watch 4 screen. But for the most part, works better than any other built in screen protector case I’ve tried for the Apple Watch 4. Very impressed for the quality and quantity! Great price! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Sandhu

customer_reviews.title: Clear Case for Apple Watch 5 40mm
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my Apple Watch 5 40mm. Easy to install. No issues with touch sensory. The product itself does well with protecting. However it does easily scuff. I’ve had it for a couple days got a scuff mark on it that won’t come off. Tried cleaning it but it just smeared. Shipping was fast and easy. Didn’t get quite exactly what I ordered. Ordered 2 transparent cases, and instead received 1 transparent and 1 black.
customer_reviews.author: Ja

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sweat!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It worked just fine till I worked out at the gym!!! My workouts consist of about 40 mins on a Arc Glider, some weights and then 20 mins on a treadmill. By the time I was done in my Arc Glider there was so must condensation on the inside I couldn’t use the touchscreen !!!!! I swear a lot during my workouts bc they r mostly cardio! Didn’t dry out at all!!! Had to come home a use a Q tip crammed under the screen protector in an effort to soak up all the water!!! Ended up taking it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water & sweat get trapped underneath
customer_reviews.text: These were actually quite nice, although I ended up not using them. Sometimes it would be difficult to get the touch screen to work, particularly if water or sweat got on the cover. I also noticed that sweat would get trapped underneath the protective screen - this became a huge draw back because I'd have to take it off, ensure it was fully dry, clean the watch, and then put the case back on. Since I exercise in some form or fashion at least 6 days a week, that's a lot of maintenance. It ended up being the straw on the camel's back for me, and the largest reason I won't be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Easy to install side/screen protection
customer_reviews.text: I received these a few weeks ago. Just as iI expected: a bumper around the sides and a screen protector, all in one. (Would love something like this for my iPhone!) Found them pretty easy to install; following the pictorial directions makes this task a success. You also need to make sure your screen is very clean; the wipes that come with the protectors help. Thankfully, it’s easy to remove if you miss a speck. Cover has not affected touch screen sensitivity at all. These are great, and I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Spirko

customer_reviews.title: Good protection & touch but dulls display
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s a good case. I haven’t had any issue with the sensitivity, and it protects my watch. Those are the 2 most important things for me. it was a pain to get on, but once it’s there, you’re done. Really no major complaint. The part I don’t like is the clarity. It’s almost like there are “little dots” on the plastic. What I liked most about my watch was the clarity, and this really dulls it a bit. I’m not sure I’m going to stay with it because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Adelle

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and good
customer_reviews.text: Very good for its price!!! Very nice and coves the whole watch unlike clip one that falls off easily. I got a 20$ floral one from bestbuy and a week later it was gone and I couldn’t figure out when and where I lost it. It was a clip on so probably hit something or caught on to something and is lost. This one covers everything and holds on good so it can’t fall off! Very good product . I got the 2 pack one. Rose gold and clear
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Cloudiness in
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted protection for my Apple Watch screen. I have a tempered glass on my i phone XR which works great. This product allows the screen to cloud up when I am washing my hands or washing dishes not because of water on the watch but any steam from the water. It was difficult to put on the watch at first. I will look for a tempered glass to apply to the face of my watch only because this case is not what I need.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Majorly impacted touch screen
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this was a great screen protector. It’s super low-profile/not bulky, and touch screen sensitivity seemed unhindered. After a few days, however, I began to notice that my watch was almost totally unresponsive to touch. I couldn’t click on any apps/buttons, unless I practically smashed them or tapped them 20 times in a row. I’m not sure if the plastic case loosened up or what, but as soon as I removed it my watch was perfectly fine and back to normal. It’s unfortunate this didn’t work out, I liked that it was almost invisible.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done but it’s like gross after a few months
customer_reviews.text: The photos are from after a little more than a years’ use. The few scratches I have obtained to not interfere with the use of the touch screen. However, just like most clear rubber products, it turned yellow within a few months of use. Even with product care after workouts or just plain sweaty days. I still have the other and plan on switching out and throwing away the old but next time I buy one, it will be hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Journey

customer_reviews.title: Used product, not new.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. The ones I received were scratched up when they arrived. I put the black one on because I had no choice at the time and needed to protect my watch right away. It got even more scratched up as I used it so I finally had to change to the clear one which had some very dirty fingerprints on it. It also had a big scratch on it. The scratches obstruct the screen so badly I couldn’t use them. They are very hard to put on and take off, and they collect debris very badly that you have to clean them often. Don’t make the same mistake as me.
customer_reviews.author: William Jatzlau

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use if you like working out
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks if you workout a lot as soon as the plastic get wet you can’t do anything until you get it completely dried. I want to protect my watch faceplate but I also want to be able to use it. Sorry I hate giving bad reviews but it wasn’t useful for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good protection!
customer_reviews.text: Just had the case on my new watch for one day; it is very clear, soft, and fits well. It's made just like a smartphone clear case with another side up. It doesn't seem that the screen sensitivity is compromised. Overall it seems a good protection of the watch, now I don't need to worry scratching my watch when exercising with weights/bars. Still need to wait to find out whether it is scratch resistant or will discolor with time.
customer_reviews.author: Allisa

customer_reviews.title: Used to be great, something has changed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these since I bought my Apple Watch, replacing them every few months when they got scuffed or had yellowed. They worked perfectly for what I wanted. Just ordered my 3rd pack a few weeks ago, and they’ve totally changed. Now, they’re thicker and they have a rough texture On the inside. Consequently, the watch can barely register any touch with this on. Not worth it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Traps Water Underneath!
customer_reviews.text: This is nice and thin, easy to use touch screen even when on my watch, easy to put on but it scratches easy and my biggest issue is that it traps water between it and the screen. Condensation from humidity, sweat if I wear it running, and water drops from hand washing all get trapped under it rendering the screen useless and I wonder if it will damage the watch if it is always wet. Will not be using it.
customer_reviews.author: Strawberry Fields Creative

customer_reviews.title: Turns yellowish quickly
customer_reviews.text: I would love these BUT after 3 weeks mine started turning yellowish. I don’t shower with my watch on so it’s not cuz of that. Just everyday use and working out, it turned yellowish quickly. Not even a month. Also it’s hard to put it on and off. It protects your watch from scratches even on the sides and also touch screen but water gets in from humidity. Bummed that it turns yellow quickly.
customer_reviews.author: JWLAND

customer_reviews.title: Horrible. Doesn't sit flush with screen and loses touch sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this product. I just bought an apple watch series 5 and bought this as a two in one case and screen protector. Unfortunately once placed on (after I tried to decipher the image instructions on the box which took 15 min to understand) the case does not sit flush with the screen and leaves air bubbles which looks unsightly. I kept it on anyhow hoping the air bubbles would eventually disappear with time however I found that the touch sensitivity was altered and I couldn't drag or close apps with the case on. Ultimately a wasted purchase. I will be getting a separate case and stick on screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: S. S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for the sweaty....
customer_reviews.text: From the get go I wasn’t crazy about this case, as it made my watch screen far less sensitive to the touch and I was having difficulty navigating the watch. But what really did it in was after a particularly sweaty workout, I could see that moisture had gotten underneath the cover, basically creating a little puddle in there. One of my primary reasons for getting the watch is the monitor and track exercise, so that’s a no go for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Smacked it into the wall
customer_reviews.text: I got these covers from the delivery guy, installed one on my watch, and promptly smacked my watched arm into the wall. It left some paint from the wall on the cover, but completely protected my watch face. I recommended my brother, who just scratched his Apple Watch face, get a set of these. BTW, I went home, put a little bit of acetone (nail polish remover) on a q-tip and cleaned the paint right off of my Julk case.
customer_reviews.author: AmyVonne

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly and Touchscreen works good.
customer_reviews.text: Everything fits as it should and aligns perfectly. I feel safer knowing that my iWatch face is protected and will not get scratched. They included an alcohol wipe and drying cloth which was an extra bonus that I appreciated. Only thing I would say is that the images on the watch are not as clear as if it was clear glass screen protector. It seems as if the plastic is a bit harder to get that clear crisp image without it.
customer_reviews.author: Bambikha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble with it since I work out (and sweat) daily. Customer service contacted me and did everything possible to make sure I was happy with my product. Definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: There’s a reason for 3/5
customer_reviews.text: So, everything about this case is great. But ONLY if you get the transparents version. The metallic colouring on the pink causes the watch to be unresponsive to touch. (It’s a conduction thing.) So, yes, you will have problems with the functionality of your watch. I’m actually going to be returning this and buying the transparent version instead. I recommend the seller and the product, but the transparent version.
customer_reviews.author: Brijhe

customer_reviews.title: Good, but with flaws.
customer_reviews.text: It did its job / protecting the watch from scratches and such, but the one thing I really did not like about it was that the cover itself was not truly clear. In direct light, you could see a tiny “dot matrix” pattern that would hinder the view (not touch performance) that I was not really happy with. Seller made that correct and they were awesome, but, I would not buy it again. Easy to install and clean and such, but, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: 0REDSOX7

customer_reviews.title: These just suck.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these, but they straight up suck. They are not scratch resistant...yes maybe for the watch face, but they get easy scratched. Water also is always stuck up underneath the screen. I constantly clean the protector and the watch face and the protector has always had a fog on it since I began using it. Not to mention I was wearing it out in the rain fishing today and I guess just the rain made it bubble up. Don’t waste your money on this unless you plan to buy one every month.
customer_reviews.author: Siera

customer_reviews.title: Eh, never again
customer_reviews.text: It was alright while it lasted. But I could NOT stand this case. The second I washed my hands, water would get underneath, making it impossible to use my watch. Multiple times a day I was taking the straps off just to clean the case. Eventually it turned yellowish. The fact you have to take the straps off every time to fix the case was very annoying, I eventually stopped using my watch until I finally bought a new case (which I love)
customer_reviews.author: Manderssss

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover. It offers great protection to the face of your watch and is discrete since it's clear and doesn't make the watch look larger. Fits perfectly over my watch. The only draw back is that it's gotten a little foggy or trapped a little water in between the face of the watch and the cover a couple of times and because it fits well it was a little tricky to clear up.
customer_reviews.author: Celestino J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: These are ok...
customer_reviews.text: So these protectors are really easy to install, the only thing I dislike is that they are really thick and keep moisture inside them. For example, I went on a run, and I guess sweat/moisture got inside the front and it was like a swear bubble trapped, in had to take my watch off dry it off in order for the touch to work through the protector. That was pretty annoying.
customer_reviews.author: daniel mira

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that although it was touch screen, at times I had to tap a few times in order for a button to work. I also did not like that moisture gets trapped between the plastic and the watch giving me condensation type bubbles on my screen. Don’t wash your hands or take a shower with your watch. It gets finger prints on it and never stays clean. It’s just a waste of money pretty munch.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy with my purchase. Good quality. It came with 2!! I’m a very active person so my arms are always moving and bumping. You don’t realize how much you can knock your wrist into something until you are wearing your watch and you want to be carful. This cover protects the face and the side. Easy installation it. You removed your watch bands, slide the cover over the watch and put the bands right back on. I recommend ! I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Brttany

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the Apple Watch however a little difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: I was so afraid of scratching my Apple Watch that I knew I needed some sort of cover. And this one works well and the touch screen is perfect. The only issue I had was that it was a little difficult to put on and I felt like I almost ripped it trying to get it on. The package came with two covers pink and clear but with the difficulty of putting it on I don’t think I will change the covers unless this one rips so I guess it is good I have an extra cover. Overall I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: Please, read this review before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: They do protect your watch however, dirt and water gets between the screen protector and your watch and it can cause scratches to the screen. Also, the screen protector is not as easy to put on and take off as I expected and does take some time to do so. Please, note that the plastic that this screen protector is made from can react to certain soaps or cleaners and destroy the screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Protects but can limit functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the overall look and feel once installed but they could be tricky to get on without getting dust or smudges involved. Once worn around the house with my LO, it didn’t take long to get little and big scratches/scuffs that eventually started to affect the touch sensibility. In the long run, you get what you pay for. It does in a sense keep the screen protected but depending on the damage can affect functionality. Wound up switching to a different brand clear bumper and am more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Rose

customer_reviews.title: Protects entire watch
customer_reviews.text: I’m a repeat user of Julk Iwatch protectors. Fairly easy to install on watch-secure once on the watch. Protects well against scratches and screen remains responsive. Comes in several colors-just wish the colors were made with a matte finish. Only downside is the clear protector will discolor a bit over time But at such a reasonable cost easy to replace with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Has already saved my watch face
customer_reviews.text: I love this. My new Apple watch is my baby and I don't want it to get scratched. This thing has saved the face twice when i accidentally knocked it against a wall I was walking too close to. There was a mark on the plastic cover that rubbed off, but i know my watch would have been damaged. I only gave it four stars because it does decrease the sensitivity of the watch. Sometimes i have to hit app buttons four or five times before they will open etc. But overall, that's worth the annoyance to save my watch from damage.
customer_reviews.author: YeahBooks

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Case for my Apple Watch 4 (40mm)
customer_reviews.text: This case is the perfect case for the Apple Watch 40mm. It's is very clear and does not add bulk to the watch. My husband had bought me a different brand which made my watch look too big on my wrist and I didn't like it. So I purchased this hoping that it really was thin enough per the item description. It came with two cases, so I gave the other one to my son who also had a 40mm Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Jones

customer_reviews.title: It is Great!
customer_reviews.text: The first day I had my apple watch on, I had scuffed it. I wish I had bought this and had it ready and waiting when my watch arrived. The white is nice, and the pink shield is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: lotrgranny

customer_reviews.title: Horrible dots everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Both colors I received installed easy, but unlike my last protector of this type (that worked well for 6 months before the watch was lost in a river) this one has tons of tiny dots that you have to look at all over the screen! It totally ruins the screen quality and I hated looking at it. Didn’t even keep them on for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work as I expected. Once the product is worn in the shower with the watch. The flaws of the design we can to appear. This item does not have a snug and tight enough fit to prevent water from being trapped behind the plastic. When this happens you are not able to touch your screen or make any selections on the face of your Apple Watch. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long, useless if gets wet, scuffed or dirty
customer_reviews.text: While they are thin and work pretty well when brand new, once they get even remotely wet or dirty the watch interface does not work and you have to remove this little cover to use your watch. Even after careful and thorough cleaning, it did not work with my watch anymore. For us, these worked for just a couple of weeks before we had to replace them and that is ONLY if you do not get your watch wet at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. McCane

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like this case
customer_reviews.text: This case is too “soft” for me so I’ll have to look for a hard plastic case. This case allows condensation to build under the case and on the watch’s screen which I don’t like. Also my watch screen doesn’t react when I touch it sometimes, only sometimes. On the other hand this case does prevent scratches so that’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Pantaleon

customer_reviews.title: Simple, protective.  You will forget it’s there.
customer_reviews.text: This protective cover surprised me because it easily snapped into place and it works as promised. It causes no problems. You may even forget it’s there (I did). I recently noticed I had a bit of scarring and white paint on the face after moving some furniture, and then I remembered I had this protective case in place. Two cases come in the package so no problem to switch!
customer_reviews.author: Errin

customer_reviews.title: Good but nearly useless if wet
customer_reviews.text: So I really like these as it fits nicely and doesn’t detract from the look of the watch the ways other do. Unfortunately when using this at the gym it makes touching the screen almost impossible and given that this is the time when you’d most likely want it on it renders the watch useless. If it’s not wet with any water or perspiration it works great but if you plan to use this in water or at the gym think again.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Water Gets Stuck Between Cover and Watch! :(
customer_reviews.text: This case/screen protector is easy to install, but difficult to remove. My chief concern for this product is that water often enters the space under the cover and over the screen and gets stuck there! This makes the touchscreen unoperable over the case. I have been using these screen protectors for less than 2 months (total) and both have become useless because they get stretched out while removing the protector to dry the inside. Also, the only time my watch nears water is when I am washing my hands - I always remove it when showering, brushing my teeth, doing the dishers, etc. Would not recommend :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: First, let me address the 5 stars. Design brilliant, putting on a snap. Value, well worth it. Now the reason for the 2 star rating. It has a VERY annoying discoloration on the side of virtual crown. Not visible indoors but very visible outside and worse when trying to read with my sunglasses. I really wanted to order for my Mom, but alas, no. And yes, I tried the second one and it too has the same problem. I spend most of my days outdoors, this is not what I need. Yes, cleaned and dried per instructions, not stretched. No reason for this to have happened.
customer_reviews.author: Luceth

customer_reviews.title: It’s not for me because I workout four times a week
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 3.5 I would. Unfortunately, I work out a lot and it steams up making it hard to press on the watch. I had it for 2 weeks now and have had to take it off to wipe it off. At first I didn’t mind it, but then I had to do it almost everyday. It might just be because I do kickboxing. Not sure. I did love the response time. Doesn’t even seem like I have a case on it. My friend hasn’t told me her opinion on it because I gave her the second one.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Quickly turns cloud, scratches, and holds in water.
customer_reviews.text: Water easily gets between the case and the watch. I found myself constantly taking the darn thing off to dry the watch. It also scratched easily and had a cloudy look to it. Also, the touches were not very sensitive with this on the watch. I’ve stopped using it and would not recommend it. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jrhd437

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection
customer_reviews.text: This protective case has worked well for me. I work out with my iwatch and it has held up to the wear and tear. It seems to keep good touch screen ability as well.
customer_reviews.author: jbordeno

customer_reviews.title: Moisture Mark is always there grrrrr tired of wiping it excessively.
customer_reviews.text: Even when you dry it really well it still makes this weird moisture mark on the screen and it sometimes doesn’t work as far as touchscreen goes. But it’s the only one that sometimes works because I’ve purchased a few others that I had to send back. Not sure if it working sometimes it’s good enough for a good review. Really wish that moisture Mark would not be there.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kahanek

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had known to do this sooner
customer_reviews.text: After noticing a small scratch on my Apple Watch 5, I decided it needed more protection as I wear it all of the time. These watch protectors are inexpensive, easy to install, and hardly noticeable on the watch. The touch screen is not hampered at all by the product. It is hardly even noticeable to the touch. I am glad I ordered this.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Tatum

product_meta.title: [2-Pack] Julk Case for Apple Watch Series 5 / Series 4 Screen Protector 40mm, 2019 New iWatch Overall Protective Case TPU HD Ultra-Thin Cover for Series 5/4 (1 Rose Pink+1 Transparent)
feature_bullets: Notice: This Case Fits for Series 5 40mm (2019) & Series 4 40mm (2018). Please Search [ Julk apple watch series 5 screen protector 44mm ] for Series 5 & Series 4 44mm.

Kindly Remind: Using this product at gym or sports activities may cause the moisture (from perspiration) to be trapped between this product and the watch screen. This is due to the nature of the product as it does not stick to the screen. When there are fog between the case and the screen, please clean the water mist as shown.
What You Get: 1 x HD transparent + 1 x Rose Gold Case with Screen Protector for Apple Watch Series 5/4 40mm

This case with screen protector is designed to offer external surface protection to your Apple watch series 4 40mm. Soft clear Case with built-in screen protector prevents your apple watch from dust, fingerprints and scratches.

Special Design: Made from premium TPU material, 360 degree overall protective case for Apple Watch screen as well as the edges and side of the watch, Perfect fit for Apple watch series 5 & series 4 40mm.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars11,513 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
